channel.title: DeathsChaos9 is no longer with us
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape
Unfortunately I have to report that he has resigned from his position of Global Moderator. Some think he was perhaps simply becoming too old for the job (Bieber, 2014), but the decision was necessary to maintain the integrity of our community and our people.
Those who got to know him during his time here at MoparScape remember an outspoken but diligent moderator (Davidi, 2014), while others (Bieber, 2014) will unfortunately remember him for the decisions he made during the latter stages of his tenure. I am not allowed to discuss the nature of these decisions, but I am sure you are free to post your own experiences in this topic.
A truly international moderator, DeathsChaos9 was born in Columbia, SC, schooled in Bejing, and returned to the US to serve his time as Global Moderator. I know that everyone in our community will join me in extending our heartfelt sympathies to them at this profoundly difficult time.
[u]References[/u] (Bieber, 2014) Myself and a small sample of other members of the community who submitted feedback (Davidi, 2014) Davidi2 (via his edit to this topic)

item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Locked. Just going to throw this out there too that I don’t agree with strict moderation, it pushes members away more than anything.

item.title: DeathsChaos9 is no longer with us
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Bieber, I resigned on my own accord. Had I been demoted I would not have an “Ex-Staff” badge. Don’t even know why I’m bothering to post this, you’re clearly a pathetic troll.

jme or David, could you lock this before this child’s idiocy causes me to shoot myself?

Read full topic
item.source: DeathsChaos9 is no longer with us

item.title: DeathsChaos9 is no longer with us
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“Justin Bieber, post:27, topic:542833”]To David and Jeff: I can’t believe I have to say this but please stop acting so immature. I know you’re trying to get a reaction out of me so you can justify locking this topic. You’re not mercenaries, you’re part of a staff team led by administrators. As I said in my post that was kindly removed by Jeff, this post was checked by a member of staff before it was posted. It was then deleted by a different member of staff and then restored when they realised they were mistaken. I request that any further disagreements be discussed with your administrator, as this sort of thing is the exact reason I believe dc9 was demoted.

If you delete/edit this reply, I’m posting it again because it’s not breaking any rules and you’re not supposed to remove posts simply because you disagree with them.

also im gay[/quote]
You made it blatantly obvious that you were mocking him, and now you go kid-diva on everyone because your ignorant man-child posts are being deleted. I’m surprised you haven’t been muted yet tbh

Read full topic

item.source: DeathsChaos9 is no longer with us

item.title: DeathsChaos9 is no longer with us
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:22, topic:542833”]lmao.

Being harsh doesn’t make you a good moderator. I would have yelled for you to be demoted but you gave us the pleasure of doing that yourself.[/quote]
What is it you find funny?

I never claimed to be a good moderator.

[b]Rule 1:[/b] Moderators lock topics/remove posts and topics/hand infractions to users at their own discretion as required to foster a positive community.

I enforced the rules of this community, the severity of punishment was usually based on the members history. For sake of argument lets say that a member insulted another member. If the offender had a clean history I’d issue nothing more than a warning. I was harsh when I was dealing with members with X number of previous infractions. If a member had zero regards to the rules of this site I’d have zero tolerance when issuing and infraction.

The only members to dispute their infractions (to me) were the ones that were consistently breaking rules and as soon as they could post again they’d go right back to breaking rules. I was harsh but my actions were never unwarranted.

Bear in mind this is 2010 to 2014…

Read full topic
item.source: DeathsChaos9 is no longer with us

If DC9 saw my post: +40
Normal moderation: Deletes post

This is the best choice you’ve ever made.
[/quote]

The entire time I was a mod I was always more harsh than the rest of the staff.[/quote]
Yeah, well, from experience allow me to say that this view is counter-productive, and not really conducive to a pleasant user experience.

DeathsChaos9:

The fact that this crap can be posted is exactly why I resigned. I’ve been on this site since 2008, I’m not going anywhere… and to whomever asked, I’m 21.

The few times we did get in contact about mod stuff (Whether it was me being infracted or etc) you were always so chill. It’ll definitely impact the staff team, but I’m glad you weren’t demoted for something bad
